testcase.name: To compose an email
testcase.system-out: Given User is logged into the application...................................passed When User clicks on Compose.................................................passed When user enters send to "Test User"........................................passed And user enters subject "Hi for Testing"....................................passed And user enters message "HI Mr Yogesh, Thanks for Testing"..................passed And user click on Send button...............................................passed Then I should see message sent "Test user user (username0987)"..............passed
